publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3173.4 Iain Smith: Homecoming and its Potential to Support Sustainable Economic Growthâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-3173) in the name of Jim Mather, insert at end, "and calls on the Scottish Government to bring forward details of its plans to promote Homecoming in Scotland, the United Kingdom and abroad in order to achieve maximum economic benefit from the celebrations." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
